## âœ… Checklist

**Code Quality:**
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas

**Testing:**
- [ ] I have tested my changes with real codebases
- [ ] I have verified that build/lint commands work as expected
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have checked all links and formatting in documentation

**Agent Standards:**
- [ ] Agent follows established patterns and structure
- [ ] Boundaries (Always/Ask/Never) are clearly defined
- [ ] Daily process includes all 5 phases
- [ ] Examples and patterns are provided
- [ ] Agent philosophy is clearly stated

**Integration:**
- [ ] Changes are compatible with existing agents
- [ ] No breaking changes to agent interfaces
- [ ] Documentation is updated for new features
- [ ] Examples are provided for new functionality
